page.title: 05JASON'S (AGE 9) SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday when I wake up I get dressed and go downstairs. Then I have some breakfast and then I watch television. Then I phone my friend to see if he is coming up the town. Then we go up to the toy shop and to the sweet shop and to the video shop to get some videos to watch, like Breakdance. Then we go swimming. Then when we get out we get dried. We go to the canteen. Then we go home and I ask if Jason can sleep and my Mum says yes. Then we go to Stockgrove Park. Then it starts to get dark. Then we start to go home. Then when we get home we have a wash. Then we put our pyjamas on and then we watch television. Then we go to bed.
